title: Completed PE Summary - St. Georgij
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Cockfield & Knight Co Ltd
Port of registry: Panama
Flag: Panama
Type: Dry Cargo Bulk carrier
Built: 1984
Classification society: Lloyds Register
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 159
Gross tonnage: 14971.00
Date & Time 19/12/05 17:30
Location of incident: Coastal Waters
Incident Type: Fire/Explosion
Persons onboard: 22 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 Fatality and 1 Injured crew member
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

A fatal accident occurred on the bulk carrier, St Georgij, whilst routine maintenance was being carried out on the vessel's auxiliary boiler burner system.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has written to the owners and managers of St Georgij recommending the following:

  • review of safe working practices

  • improvements in key personnel's ability to read English instruction books or have manuals translated into the working language of the crew

  • improving the issue of PPE for crewmembers joining the ship
